testcase.name: Login to existing account
testcase.system-out: Given User already on homepage..............................................passed When User clicks on signIn Link.............................................passed Then User enters email and password and logins..............................passed And 'Vivek' will be loggedIn to their homepage..............................passed

testcase.name: User tries to login with Invalid Email
testcase.system-out: Given User already on homepage..............................................passed When User clicks on signIn Link.............................................passed Then User enters wrong email 'fakeusertest@gmail.com'.......................passed And User get "Account doesn't exist. Use different phone number or email." as error.passed

testcase.name: User tries to login with Invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given User already on homepage..............................................passed When User clicks on signIn Link.............................................passed Then User enters email and password and logins..............................passed And User get "Either Email or Password is Incorrect" as error...............passed
